title: Three-Ten to Yuma and Other Stories
description: Trust was rare and precious in the wide-open towns that sprung up like weeds on America's frontierâ€”with hustlers and hucksters arriving in droves by horse, coach, wagon, and rail, and gunmen working both sides of the law, all too eager to end a man's life with a well-placed bullet.
